overview:
Cameron is the vision of iDeaDoc. As Founder and CEO this idea came to him in a plan to eliminate bad ideas. In the process of brainstorming he realized there was a tool here that could help people who has a business or idea, make it better.

As a young entrepreneur Cameron has learned the ups and downs of generating business. Adopting web design and eventually user experience design and development, it came natural to him to create a visual solution for this. While always making it a point to be around great problems solvers in their own frields, Cameron has been able to learn modern business strategy.

This mixture of design, intent, and a clear goal he has his eyes set on the startup world. Have worked on branding and development for startups like: TabJuice, Antengo, MySportz, WebRat, EverBank, Acceptly, Eco ATM and many others. Many of these opportunities while only invited a design position, allowed him to wear many hats, and in some occasions help refocus the companies plans to succeed.

Now partnering up with savvy people and great leaders Cameron is looking to build up a portfolio of companies with matched quality of industry leaders.
